author: fijivillage
title: Trust in God’s plan and remain silent in the face of adversity - Police Force Chaplain Rev Mawi
text: More than 200 Police officers, including officers from the five policing divisions and recruits, were reminded to trust in God’s plan and remain silent despite being falsely accused or misunderstood by others. While speaking at their Easter Service, Fiji Police Force Chaplain Assistant Superintendent of Police Reverend Joeli Mawi called on officers to remain innocent in the face of accusation as Jesus did so when he was falsely accused by his opponents. Rev Mawi says silence, humility and obedience are the best solutions to their challenges. He also called on officers to stand by their principles and values because sometimes, decision-making will be challenged. Acting Commissioner of Police Juki Fong Chew, in his Easter message, called on officers to come together and recommit themselves to becoming better versions of themselves. He says to recommit to getting rid of the old and bad practices and getting back to basics of policing. Chew says officers should recommit themselves to being professional and honest and to serve to the best of their ability at all times. Stay tuned for the latest news on our radio stations

author: Jarvis the NPC
title: Team Fight Tactics (TFT): Why Some Players are Fed Up with Subscription Services
text:
Team Fight Tactics (TFT) has always been a whirlwind of strategic gaming, blending a delightful mix of luck and skill as players battle it out in an auto-chess arena. Recently, players have taken to social media to express their discontent regarding the rising trend of subscription models in gaming, particularly noting their effects on user experience in TFT. The advent of subscription services seems to stand at a crossroads: while some welcome the added benefits and perks, others decry the inconvenience and frustrations they can bring. This backdrop has given rise to a vibrant debate, as players weigh in on the morality, practicality, and overall implications of such services in a game that thrives on tactical prowess and competition.
Summary
- Players are deeply divided over the implementation of subscription services in TFT, with many feeling disenfranchised.
- Some players believe that these services offer exciting new gameplay options, while others consider them a distraction from the core game.
- Frustrations often arise from leveling the playing field, as subscription perks can create imbalances in competitive play.
- The community remains engaged in ongoing discussions, showcasing a passionate attachment to the game and its integrity.
The Subscription Dilemma
The heart of the matter lies in the perception of subscription services as a necessary evil in the gaming world. Many players, undoubtedly echoing the sentiment of those posting on forums, feel that incorporating subscriptions into TFT dilutes the classic experience they’ve cherished. “And can make 10 with the win in round 1,” a user comments, hinting at how favorable starting conditions, perhaps offered through subscriptions, can skew the intent of strategic gameplay. It’s no longer just about casual play and clever tactics when tools and items can be “purchased” to tip the scales in your favor, leading to frustrations and accusations of pay-to-win tactics even seeping into the elegant, chess-like gameplay.
On the other side of the coin, some players take the stance that these subscription models introduce novel strategies. As one user mentions, “That augment is really good but it’s way more ridiculous in double up because if you give your teammate something like an Annie or Leona early, holy sh*t it’s ridiculous.” The idea here is that while a subscription can provide players with wholesome benefits and boosts, it can also enhance the cooperative and team-based experiences that TFT can offer. The conversation illustrates just how diverse opinions are within this corner of the gaming landscape.
Competitive Spirit and Fairness
Perhaps the most heated debate centers around the competitive implications of introducing subscription services. Participants are particularly sensitive to how these systems can affect the balance of play. “Was this a crab rave hack? Trying to figure out how you have 5 items and like 30 gold,” one user jestingly quips, expressing how absurd it can feel when someone seemingly has a leg up without putting in the same effort. The crux of competitive gaming is that it should ideally provide a level playing field where skill triumphs over sheer luck. When someone can buy their way into superiority, many number-crunching strategists feel betrayed. It undermines the meritocratic essence that many cherish not just in TFT, but in gaming at large.
Furthermore, several users noted the inconsistency of experience that a subscription model could create. “High roll augment sometimes high rolls. More at 11,” another comment points out, revealing a keen observation about the unpredictable nature of results when subscriptions influence the game. This inconsistency causes immense dissatisfaction, as players feel that their hard-earned skills can sometimes be overshadowed by subscription perks or boosts—essentially creating a scenario where luck can outplay meticulous strategy. It’s a conflict that hints at a larger conversation about what constitutes fairness in a competitive environment where each match can be as random as a coin flip.
Community Engagement and Response
One aspect that unites all players, regardless of their stance, is their passion for the game. The ongoing discussions reveal a thoughtful and engaged community bound by a shared love for TFT’s strategic depth. Players on both sides of the debate are eager to share their insights and experiences, as evidenced by a variety of comments that range from sarcastic jabs to heartfelt critiques. A user commenting, “Jesus. I’d just slap heartsteel on Sejuani and go afk until 3-5,” illustrates this engagement; even in jest, there is a kernel of serious concern about how subscriptions can affect typical play styles and strategies.
Moreover, the mix of responses—from cheering on new gameplay styles to lamenting the idea of subscriptions—shows that many are invested in protecting the core principles that make TFT tick. There’s a strange camaraderie in the discussions as players react to one another’s anecdotes, sharing stories of both glorious victories and humbling defeats, often remarking on how a tiny tweak in gameplay can throw even seasoned veterans off their game.
In essence, the debate around subscription services in Team Fight Tactics isn’t just about monetary value or access; it’s also about identity. Players are grappling with an evolving landscape tied to their beloved game and how they wish to interact with it. Whether they see subscriptions as an upgrade or a degradation of their tactical sanctuary speaks volumes about the evolving nature of gaming as a whole.
As these discussions continue to unfold, what remains clear is the deep attachment players have to Team Fight Tactics, driving them to voice their concerns and hopes. So whether you love the rise of subscriptions or loathe them, it’s evident that this conversation is far from over, and the survival of TFT’s cherished community spirit is at the forefront of every user’s mind.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: 三立新聞網
title: 台版「紅姐」化身偽娘辦性愛趴！婚後沒碰過她 妻子崩潰求離婚
text:
記者林意筑／彰化報導
▲彰化某丈夫「愛穿女裝」為偽娘，讓妻子無法接受訴請離婚。（示意圖／Pixabay）
南京偽娘「紅姐」因與多名男子發生性關係，卻暗中偷拍不雅片，畫面流出後震驚全球，沒想到台灣也鬧出偽娘風波。彰化一對夫妻婚後幾乎無性生活，沒想到妻子卻意外發現丈夫多次穿著女裝拍照，還加入「偽娘交流聊天」等群組，更相約其他同好至旅館舉辦性愛派對，讓妻子無法接受向丈夫談判，對方竟以死相逼她對偽娘一事「封口」，導致妻子身心受創要求離婚，最終獲法官批准。
據判決書指出，這對夫妻於2015年1月底結婚後同住在彰化縣出租屋，兩人婚後丈夫從未「主動」要求發生性關係，雖然2人仍育有1對子女，不過自從女兒出生後丈夫開始拒絕與妻子親密，讓妻子長期承受痛苦、自責。
沒想到2022年4月時，妻子在丈夫的手機內發現他穿著女裝的照片，更自取女性化的暱稱、大頭照加入「偽娘交流聊天」、「偽娘自拍」等聊天室，丈夫也時常上網搜尋有關「偽娘」的性愛影片，還要約同好至摩鐵辦性愛派對，讓妻子驚覺丈夫不碰自己的真相。
加上妻子也發現，丈夫多次在網路上罵她是「破麻」、「婊子」等，最終妻子忍不住質問丈夫，他才承認且希望妻子接受他的偽娘裝扮，及要求在家人面前穿女裝，甚至丈夫還多次以輕生做威脅，要求妻子不准公布他的興趣、性向。
丈夫以上種種行為讓妻子承受極大心理負擔，決定同年12月間搬回娘家居住，雙方也在10月間簽立離婚協議書，但事後丈夫仍要求妻子要維持婚姻表象、各自生活、扶養子女，始終不願辦理離婚登記。但由於丈夫常常以死相逼、體罰子女，妻子忍無可忍決定透過訴訟請求判決離婚，也希望能獲得子女的扶養權。
經彰化地院審理，認為夫妻倆分居後感情冷淡，又時常在子女面前互相指責，也發現丈夫管教子女的方式偏向恫嚇、體罰，也會在孩子面前詆毀妻子，恐對孩子的身心發展造成不利，反觀妻子與孩子的互動良好，且子女也表達希望能與母親同住。
法院認為，夫妻倆都已無繼續維持婚姻的意願，最終判准離婚，並由妻子獲得子女的監護權，至於丈夫則需至子女成年前每月支付2412元扶養費，也可在每月第2、第4個週末、寒暑假及特定節日等與子女會面。全案仍可上訴。
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->human smuggling and trafficking

author: Lycio Vellozo Ribas
title: Boletim da Fiocruz indica alta de casos de covid-19 no país, mas não no Paraná
text:
A nova edição do boletim semanal Infogripe, divulgado nesta quinta-feira (19) pela Fundação Oswaldo Cruz (Fiocruz), revela uma tendência alta de casos de Síndrome Respiratória Aguda Grave (SRAG) associadas ao covid-19 em alguns estados do país. Segundo o boletim, o Paraná não está entre os estados com tendência de aumento nem no curto prazo nem no longo prazo.
No Ceará, um cenário de crescimento dessas ocorrências já havia sido indicado na edição anterior da publicação. Há indícios de que Minas Gerais, Sergipe e Rondônia também iniciam um movimento parecido. O mesmo ocorre no Distrito Federal. Os casos envolvem especialmente pacientes idosos, que são mais suscetíveis aos efeitos mais adversos da infecção pelo coronavírus causador da covid-19.
O boletim registra aumento de ocorrências de SRAG entre crianças e adolescentes de até 14 anos, associados principalmente ao rinovírus, em quatro unidades federativas: Acre, Distrito Federal, Minas Gerais e Sergipe. Os dados do novo boletim são referentes à semana epidemiológica que vai de 8 a 14 de dezembro.
A SRAG é uma complicação respiratória que demanda hospitalização e está associada muitas vezes ao agravamento de alguma infecção viral. O paciente pode apresentar desconforto respiratório e queda no nível de saturação de oxigênio, entre outros sintomas.
De acordo com a nova edição, considerando as últimas quatro semanas epidemiológicas analisadas, a covid-19 esteve relacionada a 31,1% dos casos de SRAG com resultado positivo para alguma infecção viral. Já o rinovírus representou 38,6%. Além disso, 7,9% estiveram associados ao vírus sincicial respiratório (VSR), 7,6% à influenza A e 7,3% à influenza B.
Quando se observa apenas os quadros de SRAG que resultaram em mortes nessas quatro semanas, 63,6% estão associados à covid-19. A maioria desses casos que tiveram a morte como desfecho envolveram idosos.
Ao todo, o Brasil já registrou em 2024 um total de 78.739 casos de SRAG com resultado laboratorial positivo para algum vírus respiratório. Destes, 16,8% são referentes à influenza A; 2% à influenza B; 19,6% à covid-19; 27,1% ao rinovírus e 33,8% ao VSR. Outras 8.280 ocorrências estão em fase de análise.
O boletim Infogripe sinaliza para uma tendência de aumento de SRAG em nível nacional. Em 11 unidades federativas, há sinal de crescimento dos casos no longo prazo: Acre, Amazonas, Ceará, Distrito Federal, Goiás, Minas Gerais, Paraíba, Rio Grande do Norte, Rondônia, Santa Catarina e Sergipe. Além disso, há tendência de aumento das ocorrência no curto prazo no Acre, Amazonas, Bahia, Ceará, Distrito Federal, Goiás, Mato Grosso, Rio Grande do Norte e Rio Grande do Sul.
Cenário em 2024
Fazendo um balanço do cenário epidemiológico de 2024, a pesquisadora da Fiocruz, Tatiana Portella, destacou que o país viveu duas ondas importantes de covid-19. A primeira, que começou ainda no final de 2023 e avançou pelo início deste ano, afetou diversos estados. Já a segunda onda, iniciada em agosto de 2024, teve São Paulo como o estado mais atingido.
Apesar dessas duas ondas, a pesquisadora destaca que, em comparação com 2023, houve uma redução de aproximadamente 40% nos casos de SRAG associados à covid-19. Ainda assim, Portella alerta para o crescimento dessas ocorrências no encerramento de 2024.
“Neste fim de ano, observamos uma menor atividade dos vírus respiratórios, com exceção apenas da covid-19, que já começa a apresentar sinais de aumento em algumas regiões do país. Para as festas de fim de ano, recomendamos o uso de máscaras caso surjam sintomas de gripe ou resfriado. Também sugerimos, sempre que possível, priorizar ambientes mais arejados, especialmente neste momento de início de aumento do número de casos de covid-19”.

author: VNExplorer
title: El verdadero poder de encender una vela blanca: significado y oración milagrosa
text: La luz de una vela tiene un poder simbólico profundo en la conexión espiritual. Encender la luz divina y libertadora de una vela, en especial de una vela blanca, representa la iluminación, la guía y la purificación del alma. Al encender una vela, se crea un espacio sagrado que invita a la meditación y la reflexión personal. La llama suave y constante de una vela blanca puede ayudar a calmar la mente, facilitar la concentración y elevar la conciencia. Además, la luz de la vela, no importa su color, actúa como un puente entre el mundo físico y el espiritual, permitiendo la comunicación con lo divino y lo etéreo. Es una herramienta simple pero poderosa para quienes buscan profundizar su práctica espiritual. El poder que engendra la luz de una vela blanca La luz de una vela blanca se utiliza para purificar y limpiar el aura y los ambientes de energías negativas. Su poderosa luz engendra lucidez espiritual, devoción, pureza, salud y claridad. La luz de la vela blanca condensa todo el poder de la ascensión y resurrección, es el principio y el fin de toda la existencia. Detrás del simple encendido de una vela blanca, está la invocación del poder divino del arcángel Gabriel y su trompeta dorada que simboliza el mensaje de Dios a la humanidad. El poder curativo de la luz de la vela blanca La metafísica y el Reino angélico hablan del "cuerpo de mantenimiento" y el poder curativo del ser. Es un poder autocurativo con el que las personas nacemos, según explica el metafísico argentino, Jorge Hartkopf en su libro, "Temas Básicos de Metafísica, manual para principiantes". Encender una vela blanca es ideal en momentos de búsqueda de paz, claridad y purificación. Es apropiado durante meditaciones, oraciones por protección, y cuando se solicita guía divina o mensajes del arcángel Gabriel. También se enciende para nuevas comienzos, sanación emocional, y purificación de espacios. Su luz simboliza pureza, verdad y conexión espiritual, invocando la presencia y protección del arcángel Gabriel. Invocación del poder de la luz blanca: oración divina Conecta y visualiza la luz de la llama blanca y el arcángel Gabriel, el mensajero de Dios. Amanada presencia de Dios, Yo Soy, te reconozco, te necesito dentro de mi corazón conectado con tu llama triple. Llamo al ascendido maestro Serapis Bey, al arcángel Gabriel y el amado claridad, Elohim de la pureza y la legión de ángeles de la llama blanca para que intensifiquen el poder de la llama cósmica de la pureza dentro del mundo mental y emocional, así como de los vehículos físicos y etéricos de toda la gente joven del planeta, especialmente de (tu nombre o nombre de la persona con los problemas) en (mencionar el problema de salud o físico). Purifica sus mundos y asuntos, mantenlos sellados en un óvalo de pureza en toda dirección y permite, amado maestro, que esta situación vuelva a la normalidad. Yo invoco, la ley del perdón y del olvido por los errores cometidos en la presente existencia y en la humanidad. Gracias padre que me oíste. Invoca todo el poder inmaculado de la luz divina de las velas blancas y la energía purificadora y sanadora del arcángel Gabriel. Otras personas están leyendo esto también Chau deudas: esta es la planta y el lugar de la casa donde debes colocarla para que te llegue toda la fortuna Espiritualidad Chau deudas: esta es la planta y el lugar de la casa donde debes colocarla para que te llegue toda la fortuna Deja de buscar: el verdadero color de vela que debe utilizarse para atraer nuevos comienzos y eliminar malas energías Limpieza Deja de buscar: el verdadero color de vela que debe utilizarse para atraer nuevos comienzos y eliminar malas energías
